protocol.name: P-GSE17382-2
protocol.text: Treated with 2nM flg22 for 30 and 60 min.

protocol.name: P-GSE17382-3
protocol.text: Seedlings were grown in walk-in room on the top shelf for 8 days in MS liquid medium

protocol.name: P-GSE17382-4
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted using RNeasy plant mini kit (Qiagen) according to the manufacturer’s protocol

protocol.name: P-GSE17382-5
protocol.text: Total RNA (9.0 µg) were amplified, biotinylated and fragmented using the BioArrayTM HighYieldTM RNA transcript labelling kit (Enzo) according to the manufacturer’s instructions.

protocol.name: P-GSE17382-6
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, 10 ug of cRNA were hybridized on the Arabidopsis ATH1 GeneChips using the Affymetrix 640 Hybridization Oven. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.

protocol.name: P-GSE17382-7
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using GeneChip Scanner 7G with AutoLoader.

protocol.name: P-GSE17382-8
protocol.text: The data were analyzed in FlexArray with RMA including background correction and normalization.
